name: transitdata-partial-apc-expander-combiner
description: Expand partial APC messages with trip metadata and combine them by stops to create full APC messages

scripts.build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run build:src
scripts.build:protobuf: npm run build:mqtt && npm run build:hfp && npm run build:passenger-count
scripts.build:mqtt: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/mqtt.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/mqtt.js ./protobuf/mqtt.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protobuf/mqtt.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/mqtt.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/mqtt.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:hfp: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/hfp.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/hfp.js ./protobuf/hfp.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protobuf/hfp.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/hfp.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/hfp.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:passenger-count: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.js ./protobuf/passenger-count.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protobuf/passenger-count.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:partial-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/partialApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/partialApc.ts --top-level PartialApc --lang ts --src-lang json --src ./quicktype/partial-apc.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/partialApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/partialApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/partialApc.ts
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.check-and-build:no-testcontainer-tests: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test:no-testcontainer-tests && npm run build

author: haphut <haphut@mistmap.com>
